lead_paragraph: Winning a PGA Tour event for the second straight year, especially the manner in which Justin Thomas rallied in Malaysia, made it easy to assume that a player of his polish and power could be on the verge of breaking through to the next level.

headline.print_headline: Thomas a Winner Again, and Still a Long Road Toward the Top
headline.main: Thomas a Winner Again, and Still a Long Road Toward the Top

snippet: Winning a PGA Tour event for the second straight year, especially the manner in which Justin Thomas rallied in Malaysia, made it easy to assume that a player of his polish and power could be on the verge of breaking through to the next level....
